item.title: Chris Matthews retires from MSNBC, cites comments to women
item.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Longtime MSNBC host Chris Matthews retired from his “Hardball” point out on Monday, apologizing for making contaminated comments about females and following a brutal week the put he additionally took warmth from supporters of Bernie Sanders and Elizabeth Warren.
